title.rendered: Kylian Mbappe is probably known to more people in India than in France: PM Modi in Paris

content.rendered:
PM Narendra Modi told the Indian diaspora in Paris, “You should come to India to see…popularity of French footballers.”

He went on to remark that French player Kylian Mbappe is arguably more well-known in India than in France, calling him a “superhit” among Indian youth. Mbappe was awarded the Golden Boot at the 2022 FIFA World Cup.

Read Also: What’s the difference between me and another person if I also sulk: Ashwin on WTC final

Mbappe was awarded the Golden Boot at the 2022 FIFA […]
